```{r}
A <- matrix(c(4,-2,0,5,-2,1,3,4,-1),3,3,TRUE)
b <- c(2,7,3)
showEqn(A,b)
```
```{r}
Solve(A,b)
```
```{r}
plotEqn3d(A,b)
```

```{r}
echelon(A,b)
```

```{r}
echelon(A,b,verbose=TRUE, fractions=TRUE)
```
```{r}
echelon(A,b, verbose=TRUE)
```
